block.p: Hadley Howe Longstreth, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Peter S. Longstreth of Philadelphia, was married yesterday to Clark Gamble Peterson, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George Peterson III of Bernardsville, N.J. The Rev. John R. Francis performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in Chestnut Hill, Pa.

Mrs. Peterson, 26, is a project manager for Organic Inc., a Web site development company in New York. She graduated cum laude from Hamilton College. Her father is a managing partner in the Aegis Property Group, a commercial real estate management and development company in Philadelphia. Her mother, Elizabeth S. Longstreth, is the director of development for Chestnut Hill Academy, a private school for boys.

His mother, Anne G. Peterson, is a floral arranger in Bernardsville. His father retired as a senior vice president for portfolio-services marketing at Oppenheimer Capital, the New York investment management business.
